mapper.sql: SELECT f.feed_id, f.user_id, f.feed_title, f.feed_content, f.feed_state, f.feed_regdate, u.id, u.name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_likes l WHERE l.feed_id = f.feed_id ) "likeCnt" FROM feeds f JOIN user u ON f.user_id = u.id
mapper.select: WHERE feed_state = 'comp' AND f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY feed_regdate DESC
WHERE feed_state = 'temp' AND f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY feed_regdate DESC
SELECT t.tag_name FROM feed_tags t JOIN feed_tag_table f ON t.tag_id = f.tag_id WHERE feed_id = #{feedId}
SELECT f.feed_id FROM feeds f, user u WHERE f.user_id = u.id AND u.name = #{keyword}
SELECT count(*) FROM feeds f, user u WHERE f.user_id = u.id AND u.id = #{userId} AND f.feed_state = #{state} ORDER BY feed_regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feeds (user_id, feed_title, feed_content, feed_state) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{feedTitle}, #{feedContent}, #{feedState})
